item.title: Deleting all food in inventory when going in entrance :p
item.dc:creator: @hellzor hellzor
item.description:
@hellzor wrote:

[quote=“Usagi, post:2, topic:353237”][code=java] for(int i = 0; i < 28; i++) {
deleteItem(1961, 1);

                    }[/code]

[font=courier]Add all the other items in a similar fashion, only once. Then add this right where all your delete items are (take the ones you have out) and this will delete them[/font]

[code=java]
if (objectID == 2852) //entrance MoM
{
if(playerLevel[16] >= 45){
addSkillXP(3000, 16);
toX = 3168;
toY = 9572;
for(int i = 0; i < 28; i++) {
deleteItem(1961, 1);
deleteItem(315, 1);
deleteItem(325, 1);
deleteItem(319, 1);
deleteItem(3151, 1);
deleteItem(347, 1);
deleteItem(355, 1);
deleteItem(333, 1);
deleteItem(339, 1);
deleteItem(351, 1);
deleteItem(329, 1);
deleteItem(3381, 1);
deleteItem(3144, 1);
deleteItem(361, 1);
deleteItem(5003, 1);
deleteItem(365, 1);
deleteItem(373, 1);
deleteItem(2149, 1);
deleteItem(397, 1);
deleteItem(2142, 1);
deleteItem(2289, 1);
deleteItem(2293, 1);
deleteItem(2297, 1);
deleteItem(2301, 1);
deleteItem(379, 1);
deleteItem(385, 1);
deleteItem(391, 1);
deleteItem(7946, 1);
deleteItem(1978, 1);
deleteItem(1917, 1);
deleteItem(1919, 1);
}

}
else
{
sM(“You need an agility level of 45!”);
}
}
[/code][/quote]

than i get this error : client.java:14884: i is already defined in parseIncomingPackets()
for(int i = 0; i < 28; i++) {
^
1 error
Finished!
Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

item.title: Deleting all food in inventory when going in entrance :p
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

[code=java] for(int i = 0; i < 28; i++) {
deleteItem(1961, 1);

                    }[/code]

[font=courier]Add all the other items in a similar fashion, only once. Then add this right where all your delete items are (take the ones you have out) and this will delete them[/font]

if (objectID == 2852) //entrance MoM
{
if(playerLevel[16] >= 45){
addSkillXP(3000, 16);
toX = 3168;
toY = 9572;
for(int i = 0; i < 28; i++) {
deleteItem(1961, 1);
deleteItem(315, 1);
deleteItem(325, 1);
deleteItem(319, 1);
deleteItem(3151, 1);
deleteItem(347, 1);
deleteItem(355, 1);
deleteItem(333, 1);
deleteItem(339, 1);
deleteItem(351, 1);
deleteItem(329, 1);
deleteItem(3381, 1);
deleteItem(3144, 1);
deleteItem(361, 1);
deleteItem(5003, 1);
deleteItem(365, 1);
deleteItem(373, 1);
deleteItem(2149, 1);
deleteItem(397, 1);
deleteItem(2142, 1);
deleteItem(2289, 1);
deleteItem(2293, 1);
deleteItem(2297, 1);
deleteItem(2301, 1);
deleteItem(379, 1);
deleteItem(385, 1);
deleteItem(391, 1);
deleteItem(7946, 1);
deleteItem(1978, 1);
deleteItem(1917, 1);
deleteItem(1919, 1);
                        }

}
else
{
sM("You need an agility level of 45!");
}
}

item.title: Deleting all food in inventory when going in entrance :p
item.dc:creator: @hellzor hellzor
item.description:
@hellzor wrote:

So i made a dungeon with an intrance but if you run in the intrance your food will getting deleted
so , code i have :

if (objectID == 2852) //entrance MoM
{
if(playerLevel[16] >= 45){
addSkillXP(3000, 16);
toX = 3168;
toY = 9572;
deleteItem(1961, 28);
deleteItem(315, 28);
deleteItem(325, 28);
deleteItem(319, 28);
deleteItem(3151, 28);
deleteItem(347, 28);
deleteItem(355, 28);
deleteItem(333, 28);
deleteItem(339, 28);
deleteItem(351, 28);
deleteItem(329, 28);
deleteItem(3381, 28);
deleteItem(3144, 28);
deleteItem(361, 28);
deleteItem(5003, 28);
deleteItem(365, 28);
deleteItem(373, 28);
deleteItem(2149, 28);
deleteItem(397, 28);
deleteItem(2142, 28);
deleteItem(2289, 28);
deleteItem(2293, 28);
deleteItem(2297, 28);
deleteItem(2301, 28);
deleteItem(379, 28);
deleteItem(385, 28);
deleteItem(391, 28);
deleteItem(7946, 28);
deleteItem(1978, 28);
deleteItem(1917, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
}
else
{
sM(“You need an agility level of 45!”);
}
}

but if you see …
the item will only be deleted 1x , beccause …, 28 only works on noted items

so i tried to typ that all x28 , example :

deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);
deleteItem(1919, 28);

and that with every item
but than i have error that the code is too large!!
can someone help me?!
